title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Sometimes, it might seem as if you need the mirror of other peoples happiness before you can embrace your own. However, making your pleasure a priority is a lovely departure from your typical behavior. Often you tune out your needs because you can visibly see the results of pleasing another person. But the emotional Cancer Moon is reflecting her light in your 10th House of Authority, reminding you that your feelings can give you the feedback you need about your own satisfaction. Its wonderful if a customer or colleagues smile makes your day. Nevertheless, you deserve as much joy as you bestow on others. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
